analyzed: bod skad du / 'phags ma gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa /

original: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble One with the White Parasol!

original: srid gsum ston pa mi dang lha yi lha //
analyzed: srid gsum ston pa mi dang lha yi lha //
translated: Teacher of the three worlds, god of gods,

original: mtshungs med bde gshegs sh'akya seng ge yi //
analyzed: mtshungs med bde gshegs sh'akya seng ge yi //
translated: Incomparable Sugata, Lion of the ≈öƒÅkyas,

original: mthon mthing g-yas su 'khyil ba'i spyi gtsug nas //
analyzed: mthon mthing g-yas su 'khyil ba'i spyi gtsug nas //
translated: From the top of your head, with deep blue and clockwise curls,

original: ya mtshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso //
analyzed: ya mtshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso //
translated: The wondrous and amazing goddess, chief of the wrathful kings,

original: khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de //
analyzed: khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de //
translated: In the three realms there is no protector like you,

original: thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis mchog gi lha //
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis mchog gi lha //
translated: Lord of compassion, supreme auspicious deity,

original: sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shar 'dra //
analyzed: sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shar 'dra //
translated: Your body color is like the rising sun on a snow mountain peak,

original: zhal mang stong la sbyan mang bye bas brgyan //
analyzed: zhal mang stong la sbyan mang bye bas brgyan //
translated: With many faces, a thousand, adorned with many eyes, ten million.

original: srid pa'i btson rar sems can nyam thag pa'i //
analyzed: srid pa'i btson rar sems can nyam thag pa'i //
translated: In the prison of existence, sentient beings are distressed,

original: sdug bsngal gzigs nas sems can nyam thag la //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gzigs nas sems can nyam thag la //
translated: Seeing their suffering, you are distressed for sentient beings,

original: zhal stong phyag stong spyan ni stong rnams kyis //
analyzed: zhal stong phyag stong spyan ni stong rnams kyis //
translated: With a thousand faces, a thousand hands, and a thousand eyes,

original: kun la khyab mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: kun la khyab mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: You who pervade all, I pay homage and praise you.

original: bdud dang bgegs rigs phas kyi rgol ba rnams //
analyzed: bdud dang bgegs rigs phas kyi rgol ba rnams //
translated: Mara, obstructors, and opposing forces,

original: spyan mnga' gcig gis khro gnyer 'ga' ston pas //
analyzed: spyan mnga' gcig gis khro gnyer 'ga' ston pas //
translated: By merely casting a glance, you display a frown,

original: gnod ba'i rgyun rnams gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: gnod ba'i rgyun rnams gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa //
translated: And completely destroy the causes of harm.

original: rgol ba tshar gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rgol ba tshar gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: To you who vanquish opponents, I pay homage and praise.

original: ma rig nor bas bslus pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: ma rig nor bas bslus pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: Sentient beings deceived by the delusion of ignorance,

original: rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa yis //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa yis //
translated: By the ripening of their own karma,

original: 'du ba rnams bzhi'i rims nad mi bzad pa //
analyzed: 'du ba rnams bzhi'i rims nad mi bzad pa //
translated: Suffer from the four infectious diseases.

original: zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod //üîΩji ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la //
analyzed: zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod // ji ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la //
translated: To you who pacify this, O compassionate one, I pay homage and praise.üîΩJust as you, with supreme compassion,

original: thugs rje mchog gis 'gro don nyer bzung nas //
analyzed: thugs rje mchog gis 'gro don nyer bzung nas //
translated: Took up the welfare of beings,

original: srid gsum 'jigs ba che las bsgral gyur cing //üîΩsdug @216a * //
analyzed: srid gsum 'jigs ba che las bsgral gyur cing // sdug @216a * //
translated: Liberating them from the great fears of the three existences,

original: bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar //
analyzed: bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar //
translated: And freeing them from the illnesses of many sufferings,

original: bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i mgon gyur te //
analyzed: bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i mgon gyur te //
translated: May I too, like you, become a protector of beings.

original: sems can klu yi zhags pas zin pa dang // nad kyi bskal pas nyen pa'i sems can la //
analyzed: sems can klu yi zhags pas zin pa dang // nad kyi bskal pas nyen pa'i sems can la //
translated: And to those beings caught in the snares of the nagas, And to those beings afflicted by the sickness of the age,

original: sdug bsngal sel ba'i skyabs su bdag gyur cig /'phags pa gdugs dkar can la bstod pa /
analyzed: sdug bsngal sel ba'i skyabs su bdag gyur cig /'phags pa gdugs dkar can la bstod pa /
translated: May I become a refuge that dispels their suffering.üîΩThe Praise of Noble SitƒÅtapatrƒÅ

original: slob dpon gi ri wa tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon gi ri wa tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: is finished.
